listing.description: A freehold un-modernised house and mews house overlooking the beautiful garden square.This large family house includes garaging, 5 spacious bedroom suites, 3 principal reception/entertaining rooms & staff accommodation.
listing.short_description: A freehold un-modernised house and mews house overlooking the beautiful garden square.

listing.description: An exceptional property and one of the largest on the market in Super-Prime London with a private entrance arranged over three floors. Extending to Approx. 11,487 Sqft (1,067 Sqm) the property benefits from the sole use of, and direct access to a landscaped private rear garden, which directly overlooks St. James Park, towards Horse Guards Parade and Birdcage Walk. This location has one of the finest pedigrees of any area in Super-Prime London, has been the home of London's elite since the 18th Century and counts The Queen, Prince Charles, The Prime Minister and the Global Wealthy as residents. The property is wonderfully positioned along Queen Anne's Gate and is situated regally in between the Houses of Parliament and Buckingham Palace. The popular locations of Mayfair and Knightsbridge and their superb high end shopping and entertainment venues are easily accessible by road, public transport or on foot. In addition to St. James Park in the immediate vicinity, Green Park and Hyde Park are also nearby, offering an abundance of mature tranquil green amenity space. Positioned within a fully portered building, the property also offers easy walking access to London's marquee landmarks including Big Ben, The London Eye, The Shard and Horse Guards Parade.The accommodation of offer is sure to impress all who wisely chose to inspect and includes a magnificent entrance hall, leading to a stunning wide turning staircase. Original period features have been carefully restored including feature high ceilings, fireplaces, coving and cornicing. There is a 40ft ballroom and 60ft family/TV room, with windows overlooking the gardens and St. James Park. This property is ideal for entertaining and receiving guests and also lends itself well to a revision of the accommodation, subject to the relevant consents. There is also a spacious master suite with large en-suite, 5/6 further en-suite bedrooms, a sauna room and separate staff accommodation. The immediate streets around the property are mainly Georgian Terraces, the surrounds are stunning and this is a breathtaking location and one of Prime Central London's most desirable. This is a rare and exceptional opportunity, and one to be seriously considered. EPC Rating D
listing.short_description: An exceptional property and one of the largest on the market in Super-Prime London with a private entrance arranged over three floors. Extending to Approx. (contd...)

listing.letting_fees:
Harrods Estates can help tenants looking for luxury properties to rent in London. Now with four offices across the city's capital, each in prime locations - Knightsbridge, Mayfair, Chelsea and Kensington, our team of negotiators can help you to find the perfect luxury home - whether to accommodate: Long lets, short lets, corporate tenants or luxury student lets.

All clients looking to rent a luxury residence in London will be supported through each step of the lettings process. We have linguists within our Middle East and Russian Desks who can provide further assistance.

Tenant requirements:
Identification: Original presentation of one or more of passport, national id card, driving license, bank details and proof of address. You will also be required to partake in and satisfy Right to Rent checks for all tenancies of properties in England, commencing on, or after 1st February 2016. This will also require a face-to-face meeting with each tenant aged 18+ to verify likeness and consistency of the supporting id documents within 28 days prior to the tenancy commencing.

Referencing: Contact details for your current employer, a character reference and details of any current or previous landlords. Additional materials may be required.

Deposit: Paid in advance as security, the sum is usually equal to four to six weeks rent, but may vary depending on circumstances.

When the rental term expires, subject to there being no arrears or difference between the Check In and Check out Inventory, the deposit will be returned to the tenant. Where a difference occurs, tenants are responsible for remedy. This may include: The cost to repair or replace any damage caused, loss of furnishing and/or the cost of professional cleaning.

Standard fees:
We do not charge to register tenants, host viewings or for appointment time with any of our negotiators, however if you decided to progress with renting a property some standard fees will apply. Prices below are correct as of March 2016 but may be subject to change. Harrods Estates is part of the Propertymark Client Money Protection scheme (Ref: C0014853)

Tenancy Agreement Fee: A one off admin fee of £240 (inclusive of 20% VAT) required per property.

Referencing Fee(s): All tenants looking to reside in the property aged 18 or over, or any/all guarantors, will have to pass an independent referencing process and Right to Rent checks, the fee for this is £42 (inclusive of 20% VAT) per person, or per company.

Renewal Agreement Fee: This will be detailed in your contract and applicable only if you choose to renew. The price is currently £240 (inclusive of 20% VAT), valid from 16th March 2016.

Inventory Fees: The Check-In and Make is paid for by the landlord. The tenant is required to approve and sign at the start of the tenancy. The cost of the Inventory Check-Out is the responsibility of the tenant, along with the cost to remedy if there are any discrepancies between the two.

Check Out Fees
Vary depending on the size of the property and the level of furnishing. The below prices are provided as a guide. The actual cost of your check out will be calculated at the time you give notice and may be greater or less than those provided below.

Studio Properties:
Unfurnished £102 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Part Furnished £108 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Furnished £120 (inclusive of 20% VAT)

1 Bed/1 Reception:
Unfurnished £138 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Part Furnished £150 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Furnished £162 (inclusive of 20% VAT).

2 Beds/1Reception:
Unfurnished £150 (inclusive of 20% VAT) Part Furnished £162 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Furnished £180 (inclusive of 20% VAT).

3 Beds/1Bath/2 Receptions:
Unfurnished £198 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Part Furnished £210 (inclusive of 20% VAT) Furnished £228 (inclusive of 20% VAT).

4 Beds/2 Bath/2 Receptions:
Unfurnished £216 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Part Furnished £228 (inclusive of 20% VAT). Furnished £252 (inclusive of 20% VAT).
listing.description: This most impressive newly refurbished house (approximately 7,761sq ft / 721sq m) is located in a prime position in this exclusive Belgravia garden square and incorporates fully integral mews-house with a double garage and roof garden. Located on the quiet, favoured south-eastern corner of the Square, this is a substantial and larger than average family house. The house uniquely benefits from a double mansard roof allowing six bedrooms upstairs and an unusually large mews house to the rear with a passenger lift to all floors. The Grade II listed house has been the subject of an extensive renovation under the expert supervision and project management of renowned designers Wilben with a superior quality of finish, design and specification, including with air conditioning, Lutron lighting, Control4 fully automated audio visual system, passenger lift, under floor heating, comprehensive security, surround sound cinema and a large double garage. Chester Square is located in the heart of Belgravia with its famous white stucco terraces overlooking a large expanse of private lawned gardens.
listing.short_description: This most impressive newly refurbished house (approximately 7,761sq ft / 721sq m) is located in a prime position in this exclusive Belgravia garden square and incorporates fully integral mews-house with a double garage and roof garden. (contd...)

listing.short_description:
On offer: A fantastic grade II listed property with seven floors, 12 bedrooms, 15 bathrooms and staff quarters. Looks over buckingham palace gardens. **incredible** **click now!**

Summary

We are delighted to offer this Grade II, 12,642 ., 12-bedroom property to the market. Situated in the heart of Belgravia, the freehold property is spread over seven floors including the basement; has recently been renovated throughout; and offers a wealth of high-quality accommodation. *read on* or *call !*

Interior

The property itself is part of a grand terrace of houses that were built in the French Renaissance style in c.1868. It boasts many outstanding features including high ceilings, parquet flooring, original wood panelling and ornately-decorated ceilings. Highlights include three highly-appointed reception rooms including a spacious reception room and dining room; a fully-fitted bespoke kitchen with a central island; 18 bathrooms; marble staircases; a six-person lift; a laundry room; staff quarters and much more.

Exterior

There is a balcony to the front and a terrace to the rear, with on-road parking in-keeping with properties in the area.

Location

Grosvenor Gardens is found towards the eastern end of Belgravia, within walking distance of Victoria station and central London. This particular terrace overlooks Grosvenor Gardens themselves, with Buckingham Palace Gardens beyond.

Call Now!

In short, this newly-renovated and re-arranged property is a rare and fantastic property. So don't delay: Call today to book a viewing!

listing.description: Stretching over three buildings, this exquisite, 6 bedroom, lateral penthouse comprises 6,215 square feet with two roof terraces, private parking and unrivalled views across London.

listing.description: This stunning, contemporary building is situated just off Belgrave Square, in the heart of Belgravia. The location is both private and central with easy access to Knightsbridge, Belgravia and the West End.The communal areas are exceptionally well presented and secure with a 24 hour porter and underground parking for two cars.Direct lift access reveals an enormous entrance lobby, with double doors taking you through to the main reception room. The main reception room has floor to ceiling windows and two large terraces for entertaining. There is also a formal dining room- currently arranged as a playroom.The four bedrooms all have en suite bathrooms and are fantastic sizes; The master suite is simply breathtaking and has a dressing room and en suite bathroom.The kitchen is large, with a central island, breakfast room and terrace overlooking the beautifully maintained communal gardens.The utility room can be accessed via the service lift, meaning that this element of the property feels entirely separate.At basement level, there is a large gym / dance studio with a wooden floor, mirrored walls and a ballet barr. Outside the studio is a large storage area and there is also the benefit of a separate secure storage room. The two parking spaces can also be found at basement level.This property is perfect for someone wanting privacy, space and security within a beautifully designed building with exquisite gardens and communal space.
listing.short_description: This vast lateral apartment is set on the first floor of 10 Montrose Place- a discreet, private residential development comprising a small number of luxurious apartments with excellent security.

listing.description: This truly exceptional apartment located in the most sought after location is now available. The grand property boasts magnificent views of both Knightsbridge and Hyde Park. One Hyde Park is offering luxury London living at it's absolute finest.The property itself consists of a spacious reception room, a fully-fitted and integrated state of the art kitchen, a separate dining room, three double bedrooms with built in storage, three en-suite bathrooms, guest cloakroom, designated wine cellar and balcony overlooking Hyde Park as well as featuring a state of the art integrated home automation system. Totalling 2,500 square feet (estimate).One Hyde Park offers an unparalleled range of services and amenities, all managed by Mandarin Oriental Hotels. Candy & Candy, world-renowned for their uncompromising attention to detail and style, have exclusively designed all the communal areas of the building, including the superb spa and recreation facilities, the grand double-height reception lobby, the Park Library and the Serpentine Suite.Local amenities:The property is close to the amenities of the luxurious Knightsbridge, which has a range of boutique shops, restaurants and bars. Knightsbridge contains the world famous Harrods flagship store, which is only walking distance from this property. Also, just across the road from the property is Hyde Park; this contains the memorial of Diana, Princess of Wales. It is also a park full of history; originally the hunting ground of Henry VIII and now a peaceful park where people have pursued other pleasures from Tai Chi or simply a place to relax. Next to Hyde Park is Kensington Gardens which is full of historical architecture and beautiful grounds.Local transport links:The nearest Underground station is Knightsbridge (Piccadilly line) which is only moments from the property and for drivers, this property is ideally located for the A4 connecting London to Heathrow Airport.
listing.short_description: This truly exceptional apartment located in the most sought after location is now available. The grand property boasts magnificent views of both Knightsbridge and Hyde Park. One Hyde Park is offering luxury London living at it's absolute finest.

listing.description: This magnificent stucco fronted Belgravia town house has been redesigned to the highest standard, has unique amenities and is situated on the most prestigious corner of Chester Square.Grade II listed.The house benefits from impressive amenities including a 7 person passenger lift, parking for 3 cars (including a double garage), grand portico entrance, 3 terraces/balconies, wine cellar with large humidor, gym/jacuzzi/steam room/sauna, media room, study and very large room proportions.Exceptional attention to detail includes the finest bookmatched marbles, Tom Ford inspired bathrooms and craftsmanship from artisans who have worked at Windsor Castle and The Palace of Westminster. The accommodation is serviced by a generous 7 person passenger lift and has under floor heating and air conditioning throughout. The grand entrance hallway on the ground floor leads to a formal dining room and then a family kitchen/breakfast room (with a spectacular extra high ceiling).The first floor drawing room benefits from superb proportions, high ceilings, direct views over the Square's gardens and double doors at the rear leading onto a south facing roof terrace. The master bedroom suite is located on the second floor and benefits from a dressing room and en suite bathroom. There are 5 further bedrooms each with en suite facilities.On the lower level is a wine cellar with large humidor, utility room/staff kitchenette and leisure facilities including a stunning gym, jacuzzi, steam room and sauna.The property seamlessly incorporates the mews to the rear with a media room, a beautiful study and a substantial garage providing secure off street parking.Chester Square is regarded as one of prime central London's premier addresses. Victoria Station with an express link to Gatwick Airport is 0.3 miles from the property. The world renowned shops and restaurants of the Kings Road (0.5 miles) and Knightsbridge (0.7 miles) are nearby. (All distances are approximate).NoticePlease note we have not tested any apparatus, fixtures, fittings, or services. Interested parties must undertake their own investigation into the working order of these items. All measurements are approximate and photographs provided for guidance only.
listing.short_description: This magnificent stucco fronted Belgravia town house has been redesigned to the highest standard, has unique amenities and is situated on the most prestigious corner of Chester Square.

listing.description: Pont Street sits within the heart of Knightsbridge and allows residents to gain immediate access to a plethora of world-class amenities within the local area. There is also a selection of five star hotels, London's finest restaurants, the largest royal park, international music venues, luxury shopping, leading museums and universities all within close proximity make Pont Street an exceptional London address.The impressive main entrance has period railings adding charm to the building with a second separate entrance that is located on the lower ground floor. The entrance hallway is enhanced with high ceilings and integral lighting, dark walnut doors and bespoke designed Italian Carrara marble flooring that gives an impressive introduction to the apartment.The fully functional kitchen, with its informal dining room is perfect for relaxing with family and guests and leads out to the main terrace. The contemporary main dining room is beautifully illuminated and can be entered from the entrance hallway or alternatively through an automated sliding wall that opens up the entire ground floor level through to the kitchen area and rear terrace.The drawing room is located on the first floor and features floor to ceiling windows which open to the lower front terrace filling the rooms with natural light. The cinema room adjoins the rear of the drawing room with custom controlled light and full surround sound.The master suite is lined with silk walls and Neapolitan red gym joinery and is further enhanced by the second floor terrace, a hidden drinks cabinet and an extensive walk-in wardrobe. The master bathroom is incorporated with Blackwood and Arabscato marble with the luxurious bath positioned in the centre of the room. The pressure controlled body jet shower, Quavision television and underfloor heating combines to create a truly exceptional bathroom.The apartment comprises of a further four bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms and dressing areas.The spa is located on the lower ground floor with a large spa bath, controlled ambient lighting, a steam room and relaxation area that creates the perfect space to unwind. In addition there is a fully equipped gymnasium with independent shower and bathroom facilities.Knightsbridge area offers all the vibrancy and elegance which epitomises the highest standards of cosmopolitan city living. It is also the area of a calm beauty where the buzz of the city fades away into 250 hectares of Royal parkland.NoticePlease note we have not tested any apparatus, fixtures, fittings, or services. Interested parties must undertake their own investigation into the working order of these items. All measurements are approximate and photographs provided for guidance only.
listing.short_description: Pont Street sits within the heart of Knightsbridge and allows residents to gain immediate access to a plethora of world-class amenities within the local area.
